title: Does anyone want to make the push to gold with me in flex?
body: I did what I usually do and hit silver 5 for the border and then stopped. I have no idea what rank I actually am lol, but this time I want to see if I can hit gold and get the orianna skin, since she's one of my main champs. I'd appreciate the company (or maybe a little boosting lol). Just add me if you want to play! I play support btw, but I can jungle a little if I have to.

replies.body: I would join im bronze 1 in flex not really played it but to help you out I will.
